What is the correct URL to log in to the vRealize Automation user interface? (Choose the best answer.)

An administrator configures three different storage profiles `" Gold Storage, Silver Storage and Bronze Storage. When requesting a specific cloud template, a
Service Broker user should be able to select either storage.
Which type of tag should the administrator add to the storage profile to support this requirement? (Choose the best answer.)
What is the function of Action-Based Extensibility (ABX)? (Choose the best answer.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Free points for this question, it's basic product knowledge. ABX is for automation. Let's go through the answers: 

A. It provides the capability to migrate content between instances of vRealize Automation.

Maybe - It "might" if you're triggering ABX to do a migration... but that's an unlikely use case for ABX. And you would have to do some complex automation work for this to happen.

B. It provides efficient capacity and cost management for managed virtual machines

No - ABX has nothing to do with capacity and cost management. 

C. It provides intelligent remediation and integrated compliance for security patches.

Maybe - It "might" if you write a lot of automation to do this job and use ABX to trigger it. Once more, an unlikely use case.

D. It provides a way to execute stateless function, which contain reusable parameterized actions.

Yes - This is an accurate description of ABX. 

Once more remember that in multi choice tests, eliminating wrong answers can be as useful as guessing at the right one. Here, we can eliminate all 3 wrong answers easily. D is the answer.
D. It provides a way to execute stateless function, which contain reusable parameterized actions.

choices.B: It provides efficient capacity and cost management for managed virtual machines.
choices.D: It provides a way to execute stateless function, which contain reusable parameterized actions.
choices.C: It provides intelligent remediation and integrated compliance for security patches.
choices.A: It provides the capability to migrate content between instances of vRealize Automation.
